name: Moodle Assignment Page Dark Mode
description: Dark mode for the Moodle assignment page.
additional_info:
27th Match, 2019
- Added dark theme to scrollbar

19th November, 2018
- Added support for new Moodle URL.

18th October, 2018
- Fixed background color for image captions.
- Removed a 1px black border around all images.

17th October, 2018
- Added padding to table>td for easier readability.
- Fixed border color for table>td so it corresponds to the rest of the theme.
- Added margin to table>h4 for easier readability.

10th October, 2018
- Released
